testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to be able to create a new coupon record via the API connection.
testcase.name: When a POST body containing valid authorization information and necessary data
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token...............passed * The api user sets "api/coupon/couponAdd" path parameters..................passed * The api user prepares a POST request containing the "Coupon Ekleme 001" "attemt" 07 "2024-04-10" "2024-06-10" 35 0 1 5 0 1 information to send to the api coupon CouponAdd endpoint..passed * The api user sends the POST request and saves the response returned from the api coupon CouponAdd endpoint..passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 201.........................passed * The api user verifies that the message information in the response body is "coupon added successfully".passed
